and.description: Configuration block used to apply a logical `AND` to two or more predicates. See below. The Lifecycle Rule will apply to any object matching all the predicates configured inside the `and` block.

objectSizeGreaterThan.description: Minimum object size (in bytes) to which the rule applies.

objectSizeLessThan.description: Maximum object size (in bytes) to which the rule applies.

prefix.description: Prefix identifying one or more objects to which the rule applies. Defaults to an empty string (`""`) if not specified.

tag.description: Configuration block for specifying a tag key and value. See below.
